Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: No response on the GetServices request
Test.Description: Check GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY test when DUT returns no response on the GetServices request.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: No response on the GetServiceCapabilities request
Test.Description: Check GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY test when DUT returns no response on the GetServiceCapabilities request.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: Fault on the GetServices request
Test.Description: Check GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY test when DUT returns fault on the GetServices request.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: Fault on the GetServiceCapabilities request
Test.Description: Check GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY test when DUT returns fault on the GetServiceCapabilities request.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: There is not Capabilities in the first request
Test.Description: There is not Capabilities in the GetServices request

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request 1
Test.Description: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request (no EnableDisableAccessPointSupported in GetServiceCapabilities)

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-1-1-2 GET SERVICES AND GET ACCESS CONTROL SERVICE CAPABILITIES CONSISTANCY
Test.Name: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request 2
Test.Description: There is different Capabilities in the first and second request (different EnableDisableAccessPointSupported values)
